overview: In Dongning, the rain fell on the stone, and the mysterious creatures that came with the meteorites got into the brain of the little girl Suman. The latter, who was a vegetative, suddenly “woke up” and his attending doctor died unexpectedly. Su Mang’s aunt Su Qing is a brain doctor. In the face of everything that science can’t explain, she finds her own alumni and teaches at the university.
title: The Last Exorcism
